definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
a nonpositive number (i.e. negative or zero)

sentences.english: A semaphore is a resource that contains an integer value.
sentences.chinese: 信号是包含有一个正数的资源。

sentences.english: Was counting winter dinners, one a hill.
sentences.chinese: 正数着过冬的粮食，一堆就是一餐饭。

sentences.english: By the way, just to think about it a little bit, it's a positive number.
sentences.chinese: 此外，再多考虑一下，他是一个正数。

sentences.english: And note that that's generally a positive number.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说速率是个正数。

sentences.english: Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每个项目应该为非零的正数。

sentences.english: Compared to positive numbers, negative numbers had higher activation thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 与正数相比，负数数量表征的激活阈限更高。

sentences.english: And there's a bigger number than this, so it's a positive number overall.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很大的数，所以这边总的来说是正数。

sentences.english: Well, the first thing I know is that this is a positive number.
sentences.chinese: 好，我们知道的第一件事是这是一个正数。

sentences.english: dT/dp is positive. dT/dp is positive.
sentences.chinese: 偏T偏p是正数，好的这就是。

definition: a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
a nonpositive number (i.e. negative or zero)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
